banner_title: Hi, I'm Raúl a web developer
about_description: My name is Raúl and I'm a web developer from Costa Rica with knowledge on web accessibility and also a quick learner and backend enthusias. Always open to learn and work on new technologies. Based in Costa Rica, willing to work remotely and consider traveling if its necessary
improve_title: Always trying to improve and learn
improve_description: This portafolio was develop with new technologies I'm trying to implement into my repertoire
improve_react: Work on some small personal projects with react but those never saw the light. Working profesionally with Angular it really help me to understand a lot react early on.
improve_tailwind: I've always work on css with  sass  and alot of   Boostrap I though this could be a nice addition to my skills and I'm really enjoying working with it
improve_firebase: Heard alot from it but never work with it till this project. A Google tool that only for that fact makes it interesting to work with. Firebase also implements different areas of development that you can work with just like hosting
improve_figma: I wanted to add a desing tool to my skills since its pretty know that programmers don't do so well on design. I for the other part really care about how things look and the whole desing of this portafolio was first made in Figma.
contact_description: If you're interested in working with me you can contact me and ask for my CV
